segments.text: I can hardly believe what I’m seeing with the boy about to grab those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's one of those moments where you feel time slows down just before danger strikes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman seems so serene, completely oblivious to the chaos brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever understand how much mischief is going on right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The joy in the children’s faces is so pure, it’s hard to be really angry at them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that joy comes with a hefty risk, one I wish they understood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar stands like a beacon of temptation, and I can’t help but smile at their antics.
segments.speaker: PAR
